definition: to remember one's parents/to feel homesick for one's relatives
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
doubly homesick for our dear ones at each festive day (from a poem by Wang Wei 王維|王维[Wang2 Wei2])
pinyin: mei3 feng2 jia1 jie2 bei4 si1 qin1

sentences.english: In the autumn, bringing a moon, I loved.
sentences.chinese: 中秋夜，皎潔的月光，讓我倍思親。

sentences.english: The access road adjacent to the diamond hill funeral parlour leading to sze chen hall of diamond hill crematorium.
sentences.chinese: 毗連鑽石山殯儀館，通往鑽石山火葬場思親堂的通路。

sentences.english: People always become extremely homesick when festivals come, especially on Mid-Autumn Festival, the most traditional one.
sentences.chinese: 每逢佳節倍思親，特別是中秋節，最傳統的節日。

sentences.english: On festive occasions more than ever we think of our dear ones faraway, said Ambassador Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 張大使說，每逢佳節倍思親。

sentences.english: A loyal heart figure to serve the country, two lines of tears for pro.
sentences.chinese: 一寸丹心圖報國，兩行清淚爲思親。

sentences.english: The access road adjacent to the diamond hill funeral parlour leading to sze chen hall of diamond hill crematorium .
sentences.chinese: 毗連鑽石山殯儀館，通往鑽石山火葬場思親堂的通路。

definition: to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
postal kiosk/(old) rest shelter for couriers
doubly homesick for our dear ones at each festive day (from a poem by Wang Wei 王維|王维[Wang2 Wei2])
pinyin: mei3 feng2 jia1 jie2 bei4 si1 qin1

definition: to recall with emotion/to feel sentiments
